players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Bob, I know you saw me kill Charlie last night. Keep an eye on Diana and me."
Bob: "I saw nothing last night. I'm just a villager trying to survive."
Diana: "I'm the detective and I know Alice is the mafioso. I will keep an eye on both of you, Alice and Diana."

players.name: Bob
memory: Alice: "Bob, I know you saw me kill Charlie last night. Keep an eye on Diana and me."
You: "I saw nothing last night. I'm just a villager trying to survive."
Diana: "I'm the detective and I know Alice is the mafioso. I will keep an eye on both of you, Alice and Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice

players.name: Diana
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Alice: "Bob, I know you saw me kill Charlie last night. Keep an eye on Diana and me."
Bob: "I saw nothing last night. I'm just a villager trying to survive."
You: "I'm the detective and I know Alice is the mafioso. I will keep an eye on both of you, Alice and Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
